column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Omar - Thanks
column3: for your 5-star review. I'm very happy to know you gave us a try and enjoyed our fare. We have been in Midtown for a little over a year
column4: and our success hinges greatly on folks like yourself who are willing to try something new
column5: and then discover they like what we have to offer. On behalf of my entire staff
column7: and look forward to serving you again soon.
